items.sentence: Tom certainly seems to be apprehensive about something.
You need to get everyone in your class to vote for you.
If we've got to do it, then we'd better do it properly.
Do you know the name of that beautiful girl over there?
I haven't been to Boston yet, but I've already met Tom.
Tom has two dogs. One is black, and the other is white.
Why don't we try doing this the way that Tom suggested?
If I'd had a map, I probably wouldn't have gotten lost.
Could you tell me where can I buy another one of these?
The world's largest telescope is in the Canary Islands.
Tom said he doesn't think doing that is worth his time.
Did you feel the earthquake last night around midnight?
I didn't like Tom at all the first time that I met him.
I'd like to thank everyone who helped me get this done.
I can afford neither the time nor the money for a trip.
Even though I put on sunscreen, I got really sunburned.
The difference between you and me is that I have class.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all have one thing in common.
Tom wanted Mary to play his favorite song on the piano.
Tom started talking much earlier than most children do.
Tom probably won't be able to do everything by himself.
Tom is married, has three children and lives in Boston.
Tom is actually one of the best guitar players in town.
Tom is a good teacher and all of his students love him.
Tom has spent a lot of money trying to make Mary happy.
If somebody had broken in, the alarm would've gone off.
If someone had broken in, the alarm should've gone off.
Mary told me that she wanted Tom to buy her a necklace.
Please tell me how to fill out the disembarkation card.
This airport has up to 300 takeoffs and landings a day.
Tom isn't the only one in our office who speaks French.
I don't think that Tom knows who gave me this umbrella.
I could've helped if you'd let me know you needed help.
I still haven't figured out what's causing the problem.
Tom just stood there, wondering what might happen next.
Tom waited patiently for three hours, and then gave up.
Grandpa fell down the stairs and was seriously injured.
The bus came to a stop, and all the passengers got off.
Tom told me that he thought it would be fun to do that.
Tom told me that he thought he had a chance of winning.
Tom told me that he planned to wait until Monday to go.
Tom told me that he had studied French for three years.
Tom told me that he doesn't want to spend time in jail.
Tom told me that he didn't study French in high school.
Tom told me that he didn't really want to go to Boston.
Tom told me that he didn't have any plans for tomorrow.
Tom told me that he didn't get enough sleep last night.
Tom told me that he asked Mary to the homecoming dance.
Tom told me he was going to the hospital to visit Mary.
I'm afraid that Tom and Mary won't get along very well.
